title: The binary logarithm
content: If the binary logarithm is used more often, a separate symbol/definition could be provided for it, e.g. log2 = ` ( x e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ` ` |-> ( 2 logb X ) ) `. Then we can write "( log2 `` x )" (analogous to ` ( log x ) ` for the natural logarithm) instead of ` ( 2 logb x ) `.

blocks.name: fldivexpfllog2
blocks.content: The floor of a positive real number divided by 2 to the power of the floor of the logarithm to base 2 of the number is 1. (Contributed by AV, 26-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fldivexpfllog2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), nat1))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))))
  mpd(wcel(c0, crp), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))), wa(wbr(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1)))))
  fllogbd(nat2, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  eqid(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))
  anim12d(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1))), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crp), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cle, c0)), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), crp), wcel(c0, cr))
  elrpd(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), wcel(c0, crp))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), crp), wcel(c0, cr)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cle, c0))
  divge1b(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), c0)
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, nat2))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, nat2))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, nat2), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cmul, nat2)))
  breq2d(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, co(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), caddc, nat1)), co(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cmul, nat2), wcel(c0, crp))

  syl112anc(wcel(c0, crp), wb(wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, nat2), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cmul, nat2))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  expgt0(nat2, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))
  ltdivmul(c0, nat2, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))
  breq2i(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  1p1e2()
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crp), wb(wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))))), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), cr), wcel(nat1, cz))
  redivcld(c0, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0))), wcel(c0, crp))
  rpre(c0)
  reexpclzd(nat2, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  expne0d(nat2, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, crp))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crp), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  flcld(co(nat2, clogb, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(co(nat2, clogb, c0), cr), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, crp))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  uzid(nat2)
  id(wcel(c0, crp))
  relogbzcl(nat2, c0)
  1zzd(wcel(c0, crp))
  flbi(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, c0)))), nat1)
}

blocks.name: nnlog2ge0lt1
blocks.content: A positive integer is 1 iff its binary logarithm is between 0 and 1. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnlog2ge0lt1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wceq(c0, nat1), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat1), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1)))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, nat1), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, nat1), clt, nat1)))
  pm3.2i(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, nat1), clt, nat1))
  breqtrri(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, nat1), nat0)
  0le0()
  eqbrtri(co(nat2, clogb, nat1), clt, nat1, nat0)
  mp3an(wceq(co(nat2, clogb, nat1), nat0), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0), wne(nat2, nat1))
  2cn()
  2ne0()
  necomi(nat2, nat1)
  1ne2()
  logb1(nat2)
  0lt1()
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, nat1), clt, nat1))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0), co(nat2, clogb, nat1), wceq(c0, nat1))
  breq1d(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1, co(nat2, clogb, nat1), wceq(c0, nat1))
  oveq2(c0, nat1, nat2, clogb)
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1)), wceq(c0, nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2)))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, clogb, c0)), wbr(nat1, cle, c0)), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, crp))
  logbge0b(nat2, c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(co(nat2, clogb, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(c0, clt, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, crp))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  ax-mp(wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  uzid(nat2)
  nnrp(c0)
  logblt1b(nat2, c0)
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2)), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2)), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))))
  breq2i(c0, clt, nat2, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))
  df-2()
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cz))
  nnre(c0)
  1zzd(wcel(c0, cn))
  flbi(c0, nat1)
  ex(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1), wceq(c0, nat1))
  eqtrd(c0, nat1, cfv(cfl, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1), wceq(c0, cfv(cfl, c0)))
  eqcomd(c0, cfv(cfl, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  flid(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, c0), nat1))
}

blocks.name: logbpw2m1
blocks.content: The floor of the binary logarithm of 2 to the power of a positive integer minus 1 is equal to the integer minus 1. (Contributed by AV, 31-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm logbpw2m1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
} = {
  syl22anc(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cle, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1)))), wbr(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)))
  eqbrtrrd(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cle, cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), co(c0, cmin, nat1), cfv(cfl, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  fveq2d(cfl, co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz))
  nnlogbexp(nat2, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))

  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), cr), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), crp), wne(nat2, nat1))
  relogbcl(nat2, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), cle, co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))), wbr(co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cle, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1)))
  pw2m1lepw2m1(c0)

  relogbcl(nat2, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cr), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, c0), crp), wne(nat2, nat1))

  relogbcl(nat2, co(nat2, cexp, c0))

  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  peano2rem(c0)
  peano2re(co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(nat2, clogb, co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1)), clt, co(nat2, clogb, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), wbr(co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cmin, nat1), clt, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))

blocks.name: fllog2
blocks.content: The floor of the binary logarithm of 2 to the power of an element of a half-open integer interval bounded by powers of 2 is equal to the integer. (Contributed by AV, 31-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
